commit.message:
liveness: substitute bound regions with free ones before normalizing the return type

Fixes #32323

files.patch:

+pub trait Tr<'a> {
+    type Out;
+}
+
+pub fn f<'a, T: Tr<'a>>() -> <T as Tr<'a>>::Out {}
+//~^ ERROR not all control paths return a value
+
+pub fn main() {}
